Articles.Content:
I am kind of new here and when I try too change my Avatar Pic in Settings the only option is "Do not use an Avatar" and it also says *No Avatar Specified* 

*Please* help me:)

Hi.

I'm pretty sure that's because you're new and still in the Curious George usergroup. Shouldn't take many more posts, if any, and you'll be able to post without moderator approval, and set your own avatars.

HTH
